item.description: score:85 Chances: 3M’s spin-off of its healthcare business is a positive move for the company, as it allows them to focus on other segments and potentially unlock more value for shareholders. The completion of the healthcare spin-off Solventum signifies a strategic shift in 3M’s business operations, which could lead to improved performance and growth opportunities in the future.
